backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage with authorization checks and exposes static dispute category data and guidance fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations, associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for guidance and UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of each frontend file across components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with layout, theming, and toaster components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with reactive status states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to submit their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/DisputeCategoryS: UI component for selecting a dispute category and displaying detailed guidance fetched from backend.
frontend/src/components/DisputeChatbotPa: Empty file placeholder for the removed chatbot component.
frontend/src/components/RecentDevelopmen: Dialog form for adding or editing recent developments with validation and backend mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, navigation, authentication display, and mobile menu, wrapping children content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s user profile and checking admin status via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuidance.ts: Hooks to fetch dispute categories and request guidance results from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentDevelopments: Hooks for fetching, adding, and editing recent development entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theme styles, and global accessibility and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/disputeCategories.ts: Static mapping and list of dispute categories with labels and descriptions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutMediationPage.ts: Renders an informational page explaining mediation, its evolution, benefits, and its application in India using cards and structured text.
frontend/src/pages/ComparisonPage.tsx: Displays a detailed comparison table of mediation, litigation, arbitration, and negotiation with structured data and responsive layouts.
frontend/src/pages/DisputeGuidancePage.t: Provides a guidance intro and disclaimer, then shows a dispute category selector for personalized mediation suitability info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero content, navigation buttons, and role-based cards linking users to tailored mediation information.
Shows simple and detailed mediation process steps with tabbed navigation and descriptive step content.
frontend/src/pages/RecentDevelopmentsPag: Fetches and displays mediation-related updates with loading/error states and provides admin editing capabilities through a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/roles/CommonPersonPag: Provides guidance for parties in mediation, outlining expectations, rights, and preparation steps using informational cards and lists.
frontend/src/pages/roles/JudgePage.tsx: Explains judges' role in referring cases to mediation, offering considerations, benefits, and best‑practice guidance.
frontend/src/pages/roles/LawyerPage.tsx: Describes lawyers' supportive role in mediation, listing duties, ethical obligations, and preparation guidance for clients.
frontend/src/pages/roles/MediatorPage.ts: Outlines mediator responsibilities, required skills, and principles like neutrality and impartiality through descriptive sections and lists.
frontend/src/pages/roles/StudentPage.tsx: Introduces mediation education for students, detailing learning opportunities, career paths, and explanations of mediation roles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, and clear URL or session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing. Includes persistence helpers and a hash-parameter removal method.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the website scope, architecture constraints, existing features, and project state versioning for the Mediation Made Simple – India site.
